content: the victory garden kerchief was designed for the 2025 mn yarn shop hop | muse2320 fiber co in hastings mn the victory garden kerchief pattern is free and special order yarn from muse2320 fiber co can be found here 1 through tuesday april 15th this simple triangle kerchief was designed with the beginner in mind and features a single_crochet stitch and increases on a 2 row repeat us size g | 4mm crochet hook the victory garden kerchief requires 2 50g hanks of contrasting colors and can worked to your preferred size and length full size 32 x 19 adult head scarf 25 x 11 1 https //www muse2320fiber com/
